article_text: Nearly half of all healthcare provider networks are narrow, meaning consumers don‘t get many options when choosing a doctor, specialist or hospital. And consumers may have no idea they are in a narrow network until after signing up.

article_metadata.news-keywords: affordable care act, obamacare, obamacare florida, affordable care act florida, narrow networks, healthcare deductibles, healthcare premiums, provider networks

article_summary:
Nearly half of all healthcare provider networks are narrow, meaning consumers don‘t get many options when choosing a doctor, specialist or hospital.
And consumers may have no idea they are in a narrow network until after signing up.
